short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture useful knowledge anywhere on the internet!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TIL seamlessly integrates AI into your daily workflow, making it effortless for individuals and teams to manage and orchestrate valuable information at work.

This chrome extension allows you to easily capture useful knowledge anywhere on the internet. You can also ask the AI assistant any questions or let it summarize web pages for you. 

Learn more from: https://til.xyz

New update: 2024-09-16
Updated the extension to include the latest features in our AI text editor: https://til.xyz/product/ai-editor
Made holding ⌘ or ctrl key to enable TIL toolbar the default behavior
New update: 2024-02-08
UX improvement: now you can change the setting to only capture the content when holding the ⌘ key while selecting.
New update: 2024-03-14
UX improvement and bug fixes: now you can open up the full editor after selecting the content you want to capture, then add tags or share to specific teams.
